title: Stage Lv4-A1-S02
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: In my opinion, we should increase the marketing budget. (variant 1)
According to the data, customer satisfaction has improved. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 제 의견으로는 마케팅 예산을 늘려야 합니다. (v1)
sentences.en: In my opinion, we should increase the marketing budget. (variant 1)
According to the data, customer satisfaction has improved. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 결과를 바탕으로 새로운 전략을 제안합니다. (v1)
sentences.en: Based on research findings, I propose a new strategy. (variant 1)
From experience, this approach is more effective. (variant 1)
The statistics show a clear trend. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 분석 결과 두 가지 옵션을 고려해볼 수 있습니다. (v1)
sentences.en: The analysis suggests we consider two options. (variant 1)
There are three reasons for this. (variant 1)
The evidence supports this conclusion. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 시장 조사에 의하면 수요가 증가하고 있습니다. (v1)
sentences.en: Market research indicates increasing demand. (variant 1)
I strongly recommend this approach. (variant 1)
